data.description: Through the partnership with the Brazil Tourism Board, our team had a pleasure to work on this astonishing 360° video experience; all fully optimised to run even on a slower 3g mobile connection. The immersive experience takes user through a paragliding above the Rio De Janeiro. Hope you will like it.
data.tags: Interstitial, InApp, 360°, Video, Responsive, MRAID, Mobile, Tablet
